name.japanese: トラファルガー・ロー

keyMoments.title: Receives Warning from Sanji
keyMoments.description: Law receives a critical warning from Sanji that Doflamingo's resignation is a hoax and that he's walking into a trap.
keyMoments.significance: Despite the warning, Law is unable to escape, showing the effectiveness of Doflamingo's plan.

keyMoments.title: Trapped by Admiral Issho
keyMoments.description: Admiral Issho arrives at Green Bit with Marines, cutting off Law's escape route.
keyMoments.significance: Law's situation becomes critical as he faces a Marine Admiral.

keyMoments.title: Confronted by Doflamingo
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo arrives at Green Bit, completing the trap around Law with no escape possible.
keyMoments.significance: Law is now completely trapped between Doflamingo and the Marines.

keyMoments.title: Questions Doflamingo's World Noble Connection
keyMoments.description: Law realizes that Doflamingo's ability to manipulate world news suggests connections to the World Nobles.
keyMoments.significance: First major clue about Doflamingo's true background as a former Celestial Dragon.
keyMoments.quote: Did you really use the powers of the World Government and trick the whole world just to fool ten pirates? Only World Nobles have that authority.

relationships.description: Doflamingo has set an elaborate trap to kill Law, revealing their deeply personal conflict.

evolutionMoments.description: Law realizes Doflamingo's sole purpose for the elaborate trap is to kill him.

relationships.description: Sanji risks his safety to warn Law about Doflamingo's trap.

evolutionMoments.description: Sanji contacts Law to warn him about Doflamingo's deception.

reveals.information: Law realizes Doflamingo has World Noble-level authority

keyMoments.title: Viola Helps Sanji Escape
keyMoments.description: Viola aids Sanji in escaping from Doflamingo's men after being moved by his genuine trust.
keyMoments.significance: Sanji's genuine nature wins Viola's loyalty and defection from Doflamingo.

keyMoments.title: Warns Law About the Trap
keyMoments.description: Sanji contacts Law to warn him that Doflamingo's resignation is fake and he's walking into a trap.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sanji's strategic value in gathering and relaying critical intelligence.
keyMoments.quote: Doflamingo's resignation is a hoax! Handing over Caesar won't be a trade at all!

relationships.description: Sanji's genuine trust in Viola's tears convinced her to betray Doflamingo and help him.

evolutionMoments.description: Viola helps Sanji escape and provides him with critical information about Doflamingo's deception.

name.japanese: ドンキホーテ・ドフラミンゴ

keyMoments.title: News Correction Delivered
keyMoments.description: The world learns that Doflamingo's resignation was false, part of an elaborate deception.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Doflamingo's ability to manipulate global news.

keyMoments.title: Arrives at Green Bit
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo arrives at Green Bit using his String-String Fruit abilities to fly over the water.
keyMoments.significance: Completes his trap around Law with no escape possible.

keyMoments.title: World Noble Connection Hinted
keyMoments.description: Law questions how Doflamingo could manipulate world news, suggesting he has World Noble-level authority.
keyMoments.significance: First major hint at Doflamingo's background as a former Celestial Dragon.

keyMoments.title: Intent to Kill Law Revealed
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that Doflamingo's sole purpose for this elaborate trap is to kill Law.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the deeply personal nature of Doflamingo's vendetta against Law.

reveals.information: Has World Noble-level authority to manipulate global news

keyMoments.title: Betrays Doflamingo to Help Sanji
keyMoments.description: Viola defeats her own subordinates and helps Sanji escape, moved by his genuine trust in her.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Viola's defection from Doflamingo's crew and alliance with the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Doflamingo's Deception to Sanji
keyMoments.description: Viola confirms to Sanji that Doflamingo's resignation is false and explains the trap.
keyMoments.significance: Provides critical intelligence that the Straw Hat alliance needs to survive.

relationships.description: Viola was moved by Sanji's genuine trust and decided to help him despite being part of Doflamingo's crew.

evolutionMoments.description: Viola betrays Doflamingo to protect Sanji and provide him with critical information.

relationships.description: Viola actively betrays Doflamingo by helping Sanji and revealing his deception.

evolutionMoments.description: Viola defects from Doflamingo's crew to help the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Participates in Block C
keyMoments.description: Luffy (as Lucy) fights in Block C of the Corrida Colosseum tournament.
keyMoments.significance: Continues Luffy's quest to win the Flame-Flame Fruit in Ace's memory.

keyMoments.title: Struggles to Hide Rubber Powers
keyMoments.description: Luffy defeats opponents easily but struggles to hide his stretching abilities, nearly exposing his identity.
keyMoments.significance: Creates tension as Luffy's disguise is almost blown.

keyMoments.title: Arrives at Green Bit with Marines
keyMoments.description: Admiral Issho arrives at Green Bit with a Marine force, cutting off Law's escape route.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Marines' involvement in the trap and Issho's role in pursuing Law.

keyMoments.title: Communicates from Underground
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her Devil Fruit powers to sprout her upper half from the ground and communicate with Law despite being trapped.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin's strategic use of her abilities and the parallel storyline underground.
keyMoments.quote: What you see is just a clone. I cannot help at the moment, since Usopp and I are both stuck underground.

keyMoments.title: Jake Jake no Mi Ability Revealed
keyMoments.description: Kelly demonstrates his Jake Jake no Mi ability, transforming into a jacket that Bobby wears.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the most unusual Devil Fruit abilities in the series.

abilities.description: Kelly transforms into a jacket that can be worn by his brother Bobby, combining their strength.

reveals.information: Has the Jake Jake no Mi Devil Fruit ability

keyMoments.title: Explosive Punching Power Demonstrated
keyMoments.description: Ideo demonstrates his powerful explosive punches by defeating the giant Hajrudin.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the high level of fighters competing in Block C.

abilities.description: Ideo's punches have explosive force capable of launching even giants through the air.

keyMoments.title: Shouts Lucy's True Identity
keyMoments.description: Cavendish shouts that Lucy is actually Luffy in disguise, but nobody hears him due to the tournament noise.
keyMoments.significance: Comic relief showing Cavendish's frustration and the chaos masking important information.
